153212.content:
Since you get along with your sister Kate quite well you decide not to disappoint her and tell her that you will go to the party dressed as her. Kate's face brightens up and the two of you head to the Save and Shop thrift store.

You head to the woman's section and she picks out some clothes that she would wear in your size. Then you head to the men's section and pick out some clothes that an alcoholic man would wear.

The next night you two head out to the party at the host Kristeen's house dressed in your costumes. You are surprised that you are finding it fun to be dressed like your sister, maybe this party won't be so bad after all.

When you arrive at the party, Kristeen answers the door. You laugh at her alien costume and she seems offended. You can't figure out why, but soon forget all about it.

You see some of your friends and go up to talk to them. Your buddy Jake is dressed as a pregnant woman and his costume is pretty lame but worth a good laugh. Another buddy of yours, Fred, is dressed up as Jake's five year old daughter - complete with a teddy bear and a large lollipop. Your good friends John and Ken are dressed up as Hooter's Girls and look completely ridiculous. Finally you see your girlfriend Brooke dressed as a burly football player.

You suddenly feel sick to your stomach and go upstairs to use the bathroom. As you sit on the toilet, you notice that you can hear the sounds of the party coming through the vent. After a minute or so, you hear the party's hostess Kristeen say "Welcome to my party. Since it looks like everyone has arrived, let the fun begin." You can hear a girl say "Hey Kristeen, what is that thing you are holding?". Kristeen answers in a weird inhuman sounding voice "It is my new triganamanometer I've been working on. You see tonight, I went to the party dressed up as my actual self. For the last year though, I have been dressing up as a human in an attempt to infiltrate your society".

You hear the sound of laughter fill the room, then Kristeen's weird sounding voice starts back up "Laugh at me you little maggots. Now you will actually believe that you are the character you dressed up as. Maybe we will make some more changes later". As soon as Kristeen finished saying this the lights dimmed as if something had just taken a large amount of energy.

You can hear people talking again downstairs like the party started up, but although you can't tell what is happening, the partygoers sound much different than before.

You decide to:
153212.title: Choose a character

choices: Leave the house and get help
Stay and try to help your friends
1532122.content:
You head downstairs with a feeling of fright haunting you. As you get downstairs you notice Kristeen and two other 'people' in alien costumes plotting something. You sneak over to the door and try listening in. You can't make out everything being said, but what you do hear is making you even more afraid.

"Hahaha, look at those stupid humans. We've fried ...... brains so ........ think they .... actually their character.".

"Next, we ..... their bodies .... they actually look ..... their character.".

You then hear Kristeen say "Yeah, then since we made Bill his sister Kate, we will fry his brain some more and make him think that the house caught on fire, and that he is the only survivor. Meanwhile these other losers can live out their new lives.".

You hear them all laughing diabolically. What do you do?

You sneak back into the bathroom and climb out a window. You trip over Kristeen's garden hose and then sprint across the street to Mr. Jalapeno's house and bang on the door. "OPEN UP!"

"What is your problem?" Mr. Jalapeno snaps, opening the door grumpily. "You should be asleep, young man."

"Mr. Jalapeno! You have to save everybody! Kristeen's really an alien and she's zapped all their brains and now everyone thinks that they're who they came dressed as so now all their lives are ruined forever! You gotta help me defeat Kristeen!"

Mr. Jalapeno gives you a look like you've been taking hallucinogens and then slams the door in your face.
